MetaData.MetaDataItem: Color Touch Weekly Programming Heating Thermostat

1. Make sure the thermostat in the main interface is in OFF mode. 2. Have Z-Wave the controller enter inclusion mode. 3. Press Up button on thermostat 3 times in 1.5 seconds. The (Z) icon will twinkle at a certain interval. 4. After the twinkle stop the (Z) icon displaying means the product is in the Z-Wave network.

1. Make sure the thermostat in the main interface is in OFF mode. 2. Have Z-Wave the controller enter exclusion mode. 3. Press Up button on thermostat 3 times in 1.5 seconds. The (Z) icon will twinkle at a certain interval. 4. After the twinkle stop the (Z) icon not displaying means the product is not the Z-Wave network.
Turning thermostat to OFF mode, press MENU for 3 seconds then go the last parameter setting page by pressing Next 3 times. Set the Restore parameter.

Value.label: Memory Function
Value.Help: The Memory Function recovers the operating mode after a power failure.
